title: Remembering 9/11, Bolton Firing & Vaping
itunes:title: Remembering 9/11, Bolton Firing & Vaping
description:
Kevin spoke with Hagar Chemali, CEO of Greenwich Media Strategies and former Treasury spokesperson for Terrorism and Financial Intelligence, Craig Gordon, Bloomberg News Washington Bureau Chief, and Ron Bonjean, Partner at Rokk Solutions.

They discussed the firing of John Bolton, the anniversary of 9/11, and a ban on flavored e-cigarettes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
